headline.print_headline: Review of Evidence Finds e-Cigarettes May Help Smokers Quit
headline.main: Review of Evidence Finds e-Cigarettes May Help Smokers Quit

docs.lead_paragraph: Evidence suggests e-cigarettes help smokers quit, but more research is needed to confirm this and find out if "vaping" nicotine is better than using patches or gum, scientists said on Wednesday.
docs.snippet: Evidence suggests e-cigarettes help smokers quit, but more research is needed to confirm this and find out if "vaping" nicotine is better than using patches or gum, scientists said on Wednesday.
